Post-Match Reflections: Jalen Brunson expressed dissatisfaction with the team's performance, citing missed shots and lack of defensive stops.
Brunson also criticized the team's offensive switching and the inefficiency of the bench contribution.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks shot 39% from the floor and had identical field goal and three-point percentages.
The team averaged 20 assists, showing poor ball movement.
Tyler Kolek was the only bench player to score with three points.
OG Anunoby was the only starter to shoot 50% or better from the field.
All five starters scored in double figures but needed to be more efficient and make quicker decisions.
